name: INR
title: INR
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent codes for laboratory test for INR, or international normalized ratio.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Laboratory Test. The intent of this data element is to identify INR laboratory tests. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a laboratory test of INR (International Normalized Ratio). These are LOINC codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
